title: Sri Lanka schedules power cuts up to 5 hours on March 18
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Power cuts of 2 hours and 15 minutes for some areas in Sri Lanka, 5.0 hours for other areas in two blocks on March 15 were approved, the Public Utilities Commission said as a forex crisis creates power shortages in the dry season.
Areas ABCDEFGHIJKL will have power cuts of 3 hours and 20 minutes from 800am to 600pm and 1 hour and 40 minutes from 600pm to 1100pm.
Areas PQRSTUVW will have a 2 hour power cut from 0900am to 0400pm and another hour and 15 minutes from from 0500pm to 1000pm.
Download the power cut schedule for March 18 from 18-03-2022-Power-Interruption-Schedule-full
Media reports said there will be no power cuts when President addresses the nation in the night.
Sri Lanka is facing forex shortages due to money printed to keep interest rates low and the country has run out of reserves and the currency has been floated. (Colombo/March 15/2022)
